issue.title: [R] write_feather R Arrow freezing on windows 11
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14797](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14797). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When writing multiple large files using write_feather (possibly parquet also) on windows 11 using the arrow R package, write_feather is freezing at some point (after a few files copied). Changing cpu_count from 16 to 4 seems to solve the issue.
